GameBoard - Record Class in com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.model
A record representing the dimensions of the game board for Conway's Game of Life.
GameBoard(int, int) - Constructor for record class com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.model.GameBoard
Creates an instance of a GameBoard record class.
GameController - Interface in com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.controller
The GameController interface represents the Controller for Conway's Game of Life It handles the working of the Model GameModel by parsing the game properties and user actions to the model and conveys action outcomes to the user in some form.
GameControllerImpl - Class in com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.controller
The GameController class represents the Rest Controller for Conway's Game of Life It exposes user actions through public API endpoints.
GameControllerImpl(GameModel) - Constructor for class com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.controller.GameControllerImpl
This constructs an instance of the Rest Controller for Conway's Game Of Life and sets up a default game for user to play.
GameModel - Interface in com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.model
This interface represents a single game of Conway's Game of Life.
GameModelImpl - Class in com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.model
The GameModelImpl class implements the GameModel interface and represents the implementation of a single game of Conway's Game of Life.
GameModelImpl(int, int, Random) - Constructor for class com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.model.GameModelImpl
This constructs an instance of the GameModelImpl.
